## family-wise error rate correction

create list of p-values from Table 1

```{r}
p_vals <- data.frame(
  comparison = c("1m_net", "5m_net", "1m_5m"),
  pvalue = c(0.8128, 0.1873, 0.05714))
p_vals
```

```{r}
#p.adjust(p, method = p.adjust.methods, n = length(p))
#p.adjust.methods
# c("holm", "hochberg", "hommel", "bonferroni", "BH", "BY",
#   "fdr", "none")

p_vals_adjusted <- p.adjust(p_vals$pvalue, method = "holm", n = length(p_vals$pvalue))
p_vals_adjusted
```
